titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Anonymous Jackson, Michigan, credit rating book

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Anonymous Jackson, Michigan, credit rating book

archdesc.bioghist: For Jackson, Michigan and surrounding area.
archdesc.scopecontent: Brief statements concerning character and business practices of businessmen and trades people primarily of Jackson, Michigan, but also including Parma.
